name: Waterlogged (Babijonas, daca1337)
description:
Race down a river tied together by a rope! Don't stray too far apart. The one with the most coins at the end wins!

Controls:

  • Top Player (Player 1): Left and Right arrow keys to move.
  • Bottom Player (Player 2): A and D to move.

Made for GMTK 2021
